original: yena vijñāyate puṃsāṃ svapneṣu ca śubhāśubhaṃ ||1 ||
analyzed: yena vijñāyate puṃsām svapneṣu ca śubha aśubham

original: dvitīye tv aṣṭabhir māsai ( r māsais tri )
analyzed: dvitīye tu aṣṭabhiḥ māsaiḥ r māsaiḥ tris

original: caturbhis tu caturthe syāt phalaṃ suniyataṃ nṛṇāṃ |
analyzed: caturbhiḥ tu caturthe syāt phalam su niyatam nṛṇām
aruṇa udaya velāyām daśa ahena phalam bhavet
kṛmi pūrṇa dehaḥ raṇa cyutaḥ gātra viśaḥ dhanam ca
viṣṭhā anulepaḥ rudhira srutiḥ ca svapneṣu
ārohaṇam go vṛṣa kuñjarāṇām prāsāda śaila agra vanaspatīnām
vīṇām bhuktvā ruditvā dhruvam artha lābhaḥ

original: yas tu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ |
analyzed: yaḥ tu paśyati svapna ante rājānam kuñjaram hayam

original: suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ gāṃ ca kuṭumbaṃ tasya
analyzed: suvarṇam go vṛṣam gām ca kuṭumbam tasya

original: prāsādasthas tu yo bhuktvā samudrānte pibej
analyzed: prāsāda sthaḥ tu yaḥ bhuktvā samudra ante pibet

original: api dāsakule jātaḥ so'pi rājā bhavi ( ṣyati ) ||8 ||
analyzed: api dāsa kule jātaḥ saḥ upi rājā

original: yas tu paśyati svapnānte tāny eva labhate
analyzed: yaḥ tu paśyati svapna ante tāni eva labhate
māṃsāni svapna ante yaḥ tu bhakṣayet
śirasaḥ bhakṣaṇe rājyam labhate puṇya vigrahaḥ

original: bahukoṭīśvaro cāpi kadā cij jāyate pumān ||11 ||
analyzed: ca api kadā cit jāyate pumān

original: astrair veṣṭayate yas tu gṛhaṃ vā nagarāṇi ca |
analyzed: astraiḥ veṣṭayate yaḥ tu gṛham vā nagarāṇi ca
gṛhe maṇḍala rājyam vā nagare pārthivaḥ

original: upānahau ca cchattraṃ ca labdhvā yaḥ
analyzed: upānahau ca chattram ca labdhvā yaḥ

original: asiṃ ca nirmalaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tasya śrīs
analyzed: asim ca nirmalam tīkṣṇam tasya śrīḥ

original: naukārūḍho vipannaḥ syāt tato'pi ca samuttaret |
analyzed: naukā ārūḍhaḥ vipannaḥ syāt ca samuttaret

original: pravāsaṃ nirdiśet tasya śīghraṃ ca punar āgamaṃ ||14 ||
analyzed: pravāsam nirdiśet tasya śīghram ca punar āgamam
khara uṣṭra vasayaḥ svapna ante yaḥ tu

original: dantā yasya viśīryante uttiṣṭhanti patanti ca |
analyzed: dantāḥ yasya viśīryante uttiṣṭhanti patanti ca
bandhu nāśaḥ bhavet tasya apatyam ca
rakta ambara dharaḥ bhūtaḥ nīyate diśam
rakta ambara dharām nārīm rakta gandha anulepitām

original: avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya rātrir a ( pa ) ścimā ||19 ||
analyzed: avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya rātriḥ a  pa ścimā
śukla ambara dharām nārīm śukla gandha anulepitām

original: avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya śrī ( ḥ )
rātrau suptas tu yaḥ kaś cij jalokābhis tu
analyzed: rātrau suptaḥ tu yaḥ kaḥ cit jalokābhiḥ tu

original: kanyā tu jāyate tasya nātra kāryavicāraṇā ||21 ||
analyzed: kanyā tu jāyate tasya na atra kārya vicāraṇā

original: abhidravanti yaṃ svapne śṛṅgiṇo daṃṣṭriṇo'pi vā
analyzed: abhidravanti yam svapne śṛṅgiṇaḥ daṃṣṭriṇaḥ api vā

original: ādityamaṇḍalaṃ svapne candraṃ vā yadi paśyati |
analyzed: āditya maṇḍalam svapne candram vā yadi paśyati

original: sa puṃsāṃ labhate koṣaṃ gṛhaṃ vā saṃprayacchati ||23 ||
analyzed: sa puṃsām labhate koṣam gṛham vā saṃprayacchati

original: nigaḍair badhyate yas tu bāhupāśena vā punaḥ |
analyzed: nigaḍaiḥ badhyate yaḥ tu bāhu pāśena vā punar

original: putro vā jāyate tasya pratiṣṭhā vāpi
analyzed: putraḥ vā jāyate tasya pratiṣṭhā vā api
sahasra lābhaḥ bhavet tasya sampūrṇe daśame

original: raktaṃ pibati yaḥ svapne surām vāpi kathañcana |
analyzed: raktam pibati yaḥ svapne surām vā api kathañcana

original: brāḥmaṇo labhate vidhyām itaro labhate dhanaṃ ||26 ||
analyzed: brāḥmaṇaḥ labhate vidhyām itaraḥ labhate dhanam
yaḥ svapne sa phenam dohinī gatam

original: somapānaṃ bhavet tasya anyāṃ vā bhūtim
analyzed: soma pānam bhavet tasya anyām vā bhūtim

original: dadhi dattvā bhavet prītiḥ godhūmaiś ca
analyzed: dadhi dattvā bhavet prītiḥ godhūmaiḥ ca
yavaiḥ yajña āgamam vidyāt lābhaḥ siddhārthakaiḥ
dhūmāyamāne dhūmāyat jvalate ca artham āvehet  /

original: āsane śayane vāpi śārīre vāhane gṛhe |
analyzed: āsane śayane vā api śārīre vāhane gṛhe
